newsitem.title: USA: Integrated Packaging sees break-even Q4.
newsitem.headline: Integrated Packaging sees break-even Q4.

text.p: Integrated Packaging Assembly Corp said it expects to report roughly break-even earnings for the fourth quarter amid reduced order levels and lower gross margins.
The company said the break-even earnings would come from revenues of about $9.5 million for the quarter, which ends December 29.
The company will announce its results for the quarter on or around January 21.
The results are lower than analysts' expectations, the company said.
